string-array.name: accomodation_description
string-array.item: Im 62m² Apartment mit Sauna könnt ihr wunderbar zu viert wohnen. Inklusive Terrasse & Balkon mit Dachsteinblick. Euer Frühstück mit regionalen Köstlichkeiten könnt ihr nach Lust & Laune bestellen.
Bungalow with shared pool Fisherman\'s dream located in cozy little camp,on the south side of island Pašman, in bay called Soline.
casaBARTHEL is a perfect place for a vacation and an artist residency, immersed in the Tuscan landscape only 15\' from the Duomo and 30\' from Siena.

In the middle of beautiful pine forests there is a tiny house, an old farmplace. It has all the amenities you need for a peaceful retreat – silence, solitude, beautiful nature, a warm fireplace, sauna and starry nights.
Come enjoy the beauty, privacy and seclusion of Mountain View Villa at Alpine Falls Ranch, adjacent to the LoLo National Forest and steps away from the Clark Fork river.
Are you bored and tired of quarantine and longing for a new place and a new atmosphere to just break away for a couple of days, week or month? the megananda has the answer
This is a one of the kind loft: Awaking in soft sunlight between palms and trees and feeling the breeze from the ocean.
Nuzzled in a gorgeous setting, above the sun kissed beach of Georgioupolis in Crete, Minoas Villas captures the essence of chic and luxurious living only few minutes away from the shimmering sea.
Welcome to Muskoka A-frame, the perfect couple’s getaway or solo retreat, nestled in beautiful Hidden Valley.
Signature designed house inspired in the Ashaninka’s tribe architecture immersed in the rainforest with a private waterfall 300 meters away from your doorstep.
